result.name: Emberlight | Private Fire Pit
result.description:
Experience the charm of coastal living in our exquisitely restored studio bungalow, originally one of Avila's primary seaside residences. Nestled just steps away from the inviting waters, this serene getaway effortlessly blends timeless coastal elegance with contemporary conveniences to offer you a truly unique stay in the heart of Avila Beach.

Our charismatic Bungalow 4 is ideally situated a mere block from the sandy beach, making it an impeccable haven for those who wish to bask in sun-kissed days and enjoy the gentle sea breezes under the starlit nights.

Inside, you'll discover a meticulously designed kitchenette, furnished with essential amenities such as a Keurig, microwave, toaster, and refrigerator to cater to your culinary needs. Unwind by your private fire pit, perfectly accommodating two, and savour your meals outdoor-style with a quaint bistro table set for al fresco dining.

If you're visiting with a larger group, never fret. Additional bungalows are available through Las Casitas Avila, allowing everyone to relish a group stay while maintaining their private sanctuaries.

In Bungalow 4, convenience meets luxury. One dedicated parking space is provided, equipped with an EV charger. Guests are also invited to enjoy the shared fire pits in the picturesque courtyard. For your leisure, two beach cruisers and an array of beach gear are readily available. The bungalow is also equipped with air conditioning, ensuring optimum comfort all year round.
result.houseRules:
House Rules:

Check-in / Check-out: Check-in after 3:00 PM. Check-out by 11:00 AM unless otherwise approved.
Occupancy: Only registered guests are permitted on the property. No parties or events.
Noise: Quiet hours are 10:00 PM – 8:00 AM. Please be respectful of neighbors at all times.
Smoking: No smoking or vaping inside the unit or near doors/windows.
Pets: Pets are only allowed in pet-friendly units and must be approved in advance.
Bikes: Complimentary bikes are available for guest use where provided. Ride at your own risk, secure bikes when not in use, and return them in the same condition.
Parking: Park only in designated areas as outlined in your arrival instructions.
Care of Property: Please treat the home with care and report any damage or issues promptly.
Trash & Dishes: Please dispose of trash and wash dishes before departure.
Safety: Do not tamper with smoke detectors, safety equipment, or utility systems.
Failure to follow house rules may result in additional charges or removal without refund.

result.bookingcomPropertyDescription:
An impeccably restored studio, one of Avila's original bungalows, seamlessly blends historic charm with modern comforts. Unwind in the serene indoor and outdoor spaces, embracing the true essence of the Avila lifestyle.

Ideally located in the downtown district of Avila Beach, only one block from the sand and perfectly suited to enjoy the days and nights in Avila.

The bungalow has a kitchenette equipped with Keurig, microwave, toaster, and refrigerator. 

Bungalow 4 has a private fire-pit area with seating for two guests, and an outside bistro table for dining. 

Need more room, call Las Casitas Avila (Avila Beach) to add additional bungalows for friends and family. 

There is 1 assigned parking space. There is an EV charger. Guest are welcome to enjoy the fire pits located in the common courtyard. Two beach cruisers and beach gear is available for guest use. The bungalow does have air conditioning. No pets are not permitted. No smoking within 20' of the building.

result.name: The Deckhouse | 30 Seconds to the Sand
result.externalListingName: The Deckhouse | 30 Seconds to the Sand
result.description:
Experience Coastal Bliss in a Vintage Bungalow Steps from the Shore

Setting foot in a peacefully nostalgic, yet modernly comfortable haven isn't hard to imagine when booking your stay at our lovingly restored vintage bungalow. Nestled in the heart of Avila Beach, this delightful property exudes timeless character and is conveniently positioned a mere stroll away from the soothing ocean waves.

Our bright and airy beachside bungalow, originally part of Avila’s earliest beach cottages, serves as your idyllic retreat for a romantic escape, lone exploration, or memorable family getaway. Exquisitely located, you're only a 2-minute walk away from exquisite wine tasting, delightful local eateries boasting the best of coastal cuisine, and popular spots like Mission Pizza and the scenic Bob Jones Trail.

Inside, you will discover:
- A plush king bed that guarantees a plush slumber (vouched for by our wonderful guests)
- A comfortable sofa bed equipped with full linens, perfect for accommodating an additional guest 
- A well-equipped kitchenette featuring a Keurig, toaster, microwave, and mini fridge for your casual meal preparation
- High-speed Wi-Fi, smart TV, air conditioning, and blackout blinds for a night of complete cozy indulgence

Outside, you are welcome to:
- Utilize your dedicated parking space
- Access our EV charging facilities 
- Take advantage of the shared fire pits, beach cruisers, chairs, towels, and boogie boards - everything you need for a delightful day on the beach

If you're travelling with friends or family, reach out to Las Casitas Avila to reserve adjacent bungalows - an ideal arrangement for a group holiday with added privacy.

Our convenient setting offers an easy, enjoyable living experience. Savour your morning coffee by the beach, enjoy the short walk to exquisite dining locales, and retreat to the comfort of your snug abode for a restful night's sleep.

Avila's essence is encapsulated in our bungalow - a celebration of coastal relaxation and simplicity. Welcome home.

Note: 2 Beach Cruisers are available for use upon request, adding a touch of fun to your local explorations.

result.bookingcomPropertyDescription:
Step into the past with this adorable studio, a vintage gem among Avila's original bungalows. Meticulously renovated, it blends old-world charm with today's creature comforts.

From cozy indoor nooks to sun-kissed outdoor spots, staying at our Avila Bungalow is your ticket to savoring the easy, breezy Avila lifestyle.

Nestled in the heart of Avila Beach, just a sandy skip away from the shore, this charming bungalow is your ticket to endless Avila days and enchanting nights.

Inside, you'll find a nifty kitchenette equipped with a Keurig, microwave, toaster, and fridge. Got a bigger crew? Call up Las Casitas Avila (in Avila Beach) to add more bungalows for your pals and kin.

One parking space is all yours, and there's even an EV charger for the eco-conscious. Gather 'round the fire pits in the communal courtyard, and cruise the coast with the two beach cruisers and gear at your disposal. Our bungalow does have AC for a comfy stay. Just remember, no pets and no smoking within 20 feet of the building. Let the Avila adventure begin!

2 Beach Cruisers available for use upon request
There is an EV charger on the property

result.name: The Nest | Beachside Bungalow
result.description:
Immerse yourself in the pure serenity of Avila Beach in this exquisitely restored studio, an original Avila bungalow. Seamlessly merging vintage charm with modern luxury, this oasis promises tranquil indoor and outdoor spaces designed for total relaxation amid the laid-back vibe of seaside living. 

Nestled in the pulsing heart of downtown Avila Beach, our bungalow is just a stone's throw from the pristine sandy shore. This dwelling is perfect for your daytime sunbathing adventures and moonlit strolls, where you can soak in the coastal charm.

The homely kitchenette, boasting a Keurig, microwave, and mini refrigerator, is set for your convenience - ideal for whipping up light bites or savoring a soothing cup of morning joe.

Venturing in a group? Connect with Las Casitas Avila to book more neighboring bungalows, assuring an intimate group escapade with enough room for everyone.

Take advantage of your designated parking space and feel free to revel in our communal courtyard, complete with snug fire pits for your enjoyment. Also at your disposal are two beach cruisers and beach gear, equipping you to fully relish your coastal adventure. The bungalow is furnished with air conditioning, ensuring comfortable stays all year round.

result.name: The Shoreline Suite | Walk to the Sand
result.externalListingName: The Shoreline Suite | Walk to the Sand
result.description:
Indulge in coastal elegance at our stunningly updated Shoreline Suite, a plush one-bedroom, one-bath retreat nestled in the vibrant heart of Avila Beach. Just steps away from the captivating sandy beach, enticing local cuisine, and charming boutiques, the suite offers unbeatable convenience and tranquil vibes perfect for your perfect getaway.

The Shoreline Suite weaves romance and relaxation into every corner. Experience the pinnacle of comfort in a luxuriously fitted king bed dressed in ultra-soft, premium linens. For extra guests, a queen-sized sleeper sofa provides restful sleep accompanied by a bounty of extra plush pillows and sumptuously soft blankets for cooler nights.

Show off your cooking prowess in the newly updated kitchen, complete with high-end cookware, stylish dinnerware, and a handy Keurig coffee maker for an energizing start to your day. For longer stays, take advantage of the communal washer and dryer for added convenience.

Enjoy the refreshing indoor breeze enhanced by elegant ceiling fans in the living room and bedroom. No need for air conditioning in this coastal haven! Dive into fun beach activities with provided beach gear and two stylish beach cruisers for your ultimate sun-soaked adventures. For your perfect, fuss-free beach vacation, a dedicated parking space is available, so you can start your relaxation the moment you arrive.

Immerse yourself in the joy of beachside living at Shoreline Suite, your idyllic home away from home.

result.bookingcomPropertyDescription:
Location and comfort! Ideally located one block from the sand, shops, and restaurants. A renovated 600 sq ft one-bedroom, one bath vacation suite with a dedicated parking stall.

La Casita Suite is a one-bedroom, one bath, full kitchen, and front balcony dreamy beach house. Relax on the front balcony with morning coffee or afternoon libations. 

This beach charmer has a king bed and queen sleeper sofa, sleeps 4 guests. The king premium mattress is layered with soft premium linens for a restful night sleep. The renovated kitchen is equipped with cookware, dinnerware, dishes, and Keurig coffee maker. 

There is access to a washer and dryer on the property.

The property does not have air conditioning. There are ceiling fans in the living room and bedroom.

Beach gear and two beach cruisers upon request!

The beach house does not have air conditioning. No dogs are permitted on the property. Smoking is not permitted within 20' of the building.

result.name: Casa Azul | Steps to the Beach
result.externalListingName: Casa Azul | Steps to the Beach
result.description:
Immerse yourself in the rich history of Avila at our meticulously restored studio bungalow. This enchanting retreat flawlessly blends timeless charm with contemporary convenience, offering an idyllic haven of tranquility. Unwind within the soothing, peaceful interior or bask in the allure of inviting outdoor spaces. Our appealing bungalow lets you embrace the idyllic rhythm of Avila Beach living, just steps away from the lapping waves.

Nestled in a prime location, you are merely a block away from the sun-kissed sands and within walking distance of Avila's vibrant town center. From sunbathing to leisurely strolls to the nearby cafés and boutiques, our delightful bungalow situates you perfectly to revel in all that Avila has to offer, from dawn till dusk.

Within the bungalow's welcoming walls, discover a snug kitchenette, expertly outfitted with a Keurig coffee maker, a microwave, and a compact refrigerator (please note, there is no ice maker). Should you be journeying with a group, Las Casitas Avila would be more than delighted to reserve additional nearby bungalows for your friends and family.

Our guests have access to one designated parking space. The shared courtyard houses inviting fire pits for balmy evenings, while also providing two beach cruisers with associated beach gear for your seaside excursions.

Capturing Avila's rich history, this charming studio, an original bungalow, is meticulously renovated. Offering a serene retreat with indoor and outdoor allure, it beckons you to fully immerse yourself in the distinctive Avila way of life.

Discover the perfect location in downtown Avila Beach, just a block from the sandy shores, offering an ideal setting for savoring both the days and nights in this charming coastal town.

Our cozy bungalow features a kitchenette complete with a Keurig, microwave, toaster, and mini-refrigerator (sorry... no ice maker). If you need more space, feel free to reach out to Las Casitas Avila to reserve additional bungalows for your friends and family.

You'll have access to one designated parking space and an EV charger. Enjoy the inviting fire pits in the communal courtyard, and take advantage of the two beach cruisers and beach gear at your disposal. Please note that pets are not allowed, and we kindly ask guests not to smoke within 20 feet of the building.

result.name: La Casita | Brand New House Steps from the Sand
result.externalListingName: La Casita | Brand New House Steps from the Sand
result.description:
THE UNIT CURRENTLY BEING REMODELED. WILL HAVE BRAND NEW KITCHEN AND LIVING AREA WITH FULL OUTDOOR/INDOOR LIVING. 

Experience the unsurpassed charm and seaside serenity at La Casita Avila - an exclusive retreat tucked right in the vibrant heart of Avila Beach. Situated merely a whisper away from the sandy shore, the charismatic promenade, historic Avila Beach pier and a spectacular array of boutique shops and local eateries, our beach house offers an unparalleled blend of coastal luxury and homely comforts.

Your intimate Avila escape features a spacious interior with two delightfully furnished bedrooms and one-and-a-half modern baths, comfortably accommodating up to six guests. Revel in restful slumber with our plush king and queen beds, along with a queen-size sleeper sofa, complemented with premium mattresses and soft cotton linens. 

The heart of this home is a fully-equipped, chef-grade kitchen that comes loaded with cooking essentials, cookware, dishes, dinnerware and avant-garde appliances, including a Keurig, toaster, and blender. Preparing home-cooked meals or light snacks turns into an enjoyable affair here.

Featuring high-speed Wi-Fi and a Smart TV that comes with cable and streaming apps such as Netflix, your entertainment is well taken care of. Soak up the relaxed rhythm of coastal life as you unwind on our inviting front deck, an ideal spot for morning coffee, evening cocktails, or simply basking in the serene surroundings.

The beach house is equipped with ceiling fans in every room to keep guests cool under the coastal sun. The property also offers the convenience of two dedicated parking spaces and an EV charger. Avail the opportunity to dine out, explore downtown, indulge in wine tasting, visit the Avila Beach Pier, or play at the Avila Beach Golf Resort - all within a walking distance.

For our more active guests, the beach house offers two beach cruiser bicycles available on a first-come, first-serve basis, perfect for adventuring across Avila Beach. Embrace the vibrancy and charm of Avila Beach right from your doorstep, without the hassle of parking. It's beach living, refined at La Casita Avila!

result.bookingcomPropertyDescription:
La Casita Avila is a seaside retreat just 2 minutes from the sandy shores and promenade in charming Avila Beach. Visitors rave about its location, and enjoy the spacious living room, well-equipped kitchen, and welcoming front deck.

La Casita Avila resides in the heart of downtown Avila Beach, merely a 2-minute stroll to the beach, dining establishments, charming boutiques, and historic Avila Beach pier. 

This beach house features 2 bedrooms, 1-1/2 baths, inclusive of one king bed, one queen bed, and a queen sofa-bed, comfortably accommodating up to 6 guests. Guests cherish the well-appointed kitchen and the delightful front deck, perfect for morning coffee, afternoon cocktails, and leisurely people-watching.

Enjoy high-speed internet service and a SmartTV with cable channels and entertainment apps like Netflix. Indulge in premium mattresses and luxurious cotton sheets, ensuring a restful night's sleep for all. The fully equipped kitchen boasts chef-grade appliances, cookware, dinnerware, and dishes. A Keurig coffee maker, toaster, and blender are also provided.

The dining table comfortably seats six guests, with two additional seats at the game table. Guests have free access to the washer and dryer in a shared common area on the property. While the beach house does not have air conditioning, ceiling fans in the living room and both bedrooms offer a cooling breeze. Additionally, there is an EV charger on the property.

Please note that pets are not allowed, and smoking is prohibited within 20 feet of the building.

Your access includes the entire home and two assigned parking spaces – it's all yours! We've set up the beach house with your comfort and enjoyment in mind. Feel right at home!

Welcome to your vacation getaway, expertly managed by Seven Sisters Vacation Rentals located in sunny Avila Beach! Rest easy knowing that we've got your back with 24/7 property emergency assistance, just in case.

Walk to dinner, downtown, wine tasting, Avila Beach Pier, Avila Beach Golf Resort for golf and concerts.

The beach house is just a stroll away from the ocean, the charming Avila Beach promenade, pier, Avila Beach Golf Resort, and a delightful array of shops and dining spots. Given the parking challenges in Avila Beach, our beach house's prime location is perfect—you won't need a car to fully embrace the good life in Avila Beach! 

And remember your beach house has access to two beach cruiser bicycles for a two-wheel adventure. Bikes are on a first-come, first-served with our bungalow guests.

Here's how we're spreading the good vibes of cleanliness in our vacation rentals:

Housecleaning Extravaganza
We're going all out with a Disinfection Checklist after every guest departs. We've got the EPA-approved disinfecting superheroes on our team to ensure every nook and cranny is sparkly clean and germ-free.

Expect a deep clean and disinfection party in the bathroom and kitchen. We'll be giving some extra love to those high-touch points – light switches, doorknobs, keypads, you name it!

Laundry Love
Every checkout gets a laundry day for linens and soft goods like shams and throw pillow covers. It's like a spa day for your linens, making sure your stay is not just comfy but extra safe too.

Your safety is our top priority – vacation vibes, cleanliness, and peace of mind included!

result.name: Hummingbird House | Best View in Avila Beach
result.externalListingName: Hummingbird House | Best View in Avila Beach
result.description:
Welcome to an exquisite coastal retreat in the heart of vibrant Avila Beach. This beautifully designed two-bedroom home offers a luxurious seaside escape, seamlessly blending refined interiors with inviting outdoor living. Featuring high-end finishes, sun-filled spaces, and a private outdoor area, the home provides a peaceful setting just steps from Avila’s golden sands.

Primary Bedroom
Unwind in the serene primary suite, complete with a plush king-size bed, premium linens, and a private en suite bathroom. Thoughtfully designed with coastal elegance, the room is bathed in natural light for a truly restorative stay.

Second Bedroom
The guest bedroom offers a comfortable queen-size bed with high-quality bedding and its own en suite bathroom—ideal for couples, friends, or family seeking both comfort and privacy.

Kitchen
The fully equipped gourmet kitchen features stainless steel appliances, quality cookware, and all essential amenities—perfect for preparing meals at home or enjoying casual coastal dining.

Living Area
The open-concept living space features comfortable seating and a cozy fireplace, flowing effortlessly into the outdoor area. It’s an ideal space to relax after a beach day or gather for conversation and entertainment.

Outdoor Space
Step onto the private patio and take in beautiful views of Avila Beach. Whether enjoying morning coffee or winding down with a glass of wine at sunset, this tranquil space completes the coastal experience.

A queen-size air mattress is available to accommodate an additional guest if needed.

result.name: Monterey Heights | Minutes from Cal Poly
result.externalListingName: Monterey Heights | Minutes from Cal Poly
result.description:
Serene and stylish 600 sq ft vacation rental located in the highly desirable Monterey Heights neighborhood of San Luis Obispo. Just a short walk to Cal Poly and minutes from downtown, this private unit offers spacious living, a bedroom, and a well-equipped kitchenette. With dedicated off street guest parking and a quiet residential setting, it’s an ideal home base for campus visits or Central Coast getaways.

This is a brand new listing in a newly renovated unit.

Bedroom:
Features a luxurious Cal King bed with plush linens. Completely separate from the living room for a restful, private sleeping area.

Living Room:
Includes a fold-out couch for additional sleeping (ideal for up to two children or third adult guest).
Flat-screen Smart TV, fast Wi-Fi, and relaxed seating.

Kitchenette:
Under-counter refrigerator, sink and counter space, microwave, and Nespresso coffee maker, dish ware, mugs, and utensils
Note: No stove or cooktop in compliance with city regulations.

Bathroom:
Full bathroom with shower/tub combo, stocked with fresh towels, hairdryer, and essential toiletries.

Parking: 
At the bottom and right side of the driveway in front of the parking sign located next to the stairs that access the overnight suite.

result.homeawayPropertyDescription:
A serene and stylish 600 sq ft vacation rental located in the highly desirable Monterey Heights neighborhood of San Luis Obispo. Just a short walk to Cal Poly and minutes from downtown, this private unit offers a separate entrance, spacious living and bedroom areas, and a well-equipped kitchenette. With dedicated guest parking and a quiet residential setting, it’s an ideal home base for campus visits or Central Coast getaways. Though part of a private home, the unit is fully private and quiet.

This is a brand new listing in a newly renovated unit. We're in the process of scheduling professional photography and final staging, but the space is fully ready for guests and thoughtfully prepared for a comfortable stay.

Bedroom:
Features a luxurious Cal King bed with plush linens and ample closet space.
Completely separate from the living room for a restful, private sleeping area.

Living Room:
Formerly the home’s master bedroom, now a spacious and comfortable living area.
Includes a fold-out couch for additional sleeping (ideal for a child or third guest).
Flat-screen Smart TV, fast Wi-Fi, and relaxed seating.

Kitchenette:
Under-counter refrigerator
Sink and counter space for food prep
Microwave, coffee maker, toaster
Dishware, mugs, and utensils
Note: No stove or cooktop in compliance with city regulations

Bathroom:
Full bathroom with shower/tub combo
Stocked with fresh towels, hairdryer, and essential toiletries

Private Entrance: 
Guests access the unit through its own entrance, providing total privacy from the main house.

Layout: 
Originally a wing of the home, now fully converted into a self-contained suite with no shared interior spaces.
Sound-attenuated hallway with lockable double doors separates the vacation unit from the main home.
The only common wall is between a bathroom in the unit and the main house’s entry foyer.

result.name: The Palm House | Beachside Studio
result.description:
Relaxed Coastal Retreat | Pet Friendly | Parking

Tucked into the heart of Avila Beach, this thoughtfully updated studio preserves the charm of one of the town’s original fisherman cottages—quirky, warm, and full of character. While not flashy, it offers what matters most: an unbeatable location, abundant natural light, and a breezy space to unwind just one block from the beach.

Ideal for solo travelers or couples, the studio features a comfortable king bed, a cozy dining nook, and a well-equipped kitchenette perfect for casual meals. Large windows fill the space with light, while the private balcony offers peeks of the Pacific—perfect for morning coffee or sunset wine.

With walkable access to the beach promenade, local cafés, wine tasting, and coastal trails, enjoy the authentic charm of Avila Beach with modern comforts including Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, and a sleek walk-in shower.

Guests enjoy full, private access to the studio—every detail designed for comfort, convenience, and relaxed coastal living.

Living Area – Airy lounge with a plush sofa and flat-screen TV, ideal after a beach day or exploring the Central Coast.
Dining Nook – Bright and inviting space for coffee, casual meals, or light remote work.
Kitchenette – Compact yet well-equipped with modern appliances, cookware, and essentials for simple meals.
Sleeping Area – King bed with soft linens, natural light, and thoughtful coastal touches.
Bathroom – Clean, contemporary walk-in shower, fresh towels, toiletries, and hairdryer.
Private Deck – Balcony space to enjoy ocean breezes, morning coffee, or evening wine.

result.bookingcomPropertyDescription:
Studio home in prime location with parking and a small front patio.

Enjoy one of the old fisherman abodes of Avila past. Funky, not fancy, with some great outdoor space in a hard to beat location just one block from the beach. 

This studio home has been updated to accommodate a comfortable stay but maintain its historic character. Come relax and enjoy a little piece of traditional Avila.

Other thing to note
2 Beach Cruisers available, first-come first-served.

One (1) dog will be considered. The pet policy is 1 dog, under 45 pounds, non-shedding. The non-refundable pet fee is $50/night, max $225. A picture of your fury friend will be requested.

result.name: Pine House | Steps to Avila Pier
result.externalListingName: Pine House | Steps to Avila Pier
result.description:
Sunny Studio Getaway | Parking | Pet Friendly

Step into a piece of Avila Beach history with this thoughtfully updated coastal studio—charming, eclectic, and just one block from the sand. Originally a fisherman’s retreat, this bright and breezy space blends original character with modern comfort. Inside, you’ll find a plush queen bed, cozy sitting area, and a compact kitchenette with mini fridge, microwave, and stovetop—perfect for casual beachside meals.

Large windows fill the studio with natural light, while the private balcony offers partial ocean views ideal for morning coffee or evening wine. With high-speed Wi-Fi, a smart TV, and a clean, efficient bathroom, this studio is perfect for solo travelers or couples seeking a relaxed, walkable Avila experience.

Guests enjoy full, private access to the studio—every detail designed for comfort and ease.

Living Area – Airy lounge with plush sofa and flat-screen TV.
Dining Nook – Cozy space for coffee, meals, or light remote work.
Kitchenette – Well-equipped for simple snacks and meals.
Sleeping Area – Queen bed with soft linens, natural light, and storage.
Bathroom – Walk-in shower, fresh towels, toiletries, and hairdryer.
Private Deck – Balcony with ocean breeze, perfect morning or evening retreat.

Two beach cruisers are available for guest use upon request.
result.houseRules:
House Rules:

Check-in / Check-out: Check-in after 3:00 PM. Check-out by 11:00 AM unless otherwise approved.
Occupancy: Only registered guests are permitted on the property. No parties or events.
Noise: Quiet hours are 10:00 PM – 8:00 AM. Please be respectful of neighbors at all times.
Smoking: No smoking or vaping inside the unit or near doors/windows.
Pets: Pets are only allowed in pet-friendly units and must be approved in advance.
Bikes: Complimentary bikes are available for guest use where provided. Ride at your own risk, secure bikes when not in use, and return them in the same condition.
Parking: Park only in designated areas as outlined in your arrival instructions.
Care of Property: Please treat the home with care and report any damage or issues promptly.
Trash & Dishes: Please dispose of trash and wash dishes before departure.
Safety: Do not tamper with smoke detectors, safety equipment, or utility systems.
Failure to follow house rules may result in additional charges or removal without refund.

result.bookingcomPropertyDescription:
Studio home with yard and parking in prime location with a view deck tucked under the canopy of an old-growth Coral tree.

Enjoy one of the old fisherman abodes of Avila past. Funky not fancy with some great outdoor space in a hard to beat private and tranquil location just one block from the beach. This studio home has been updated to accommodate a comfortable stay but maintain its historic character. Come relax and enjoy a little piece of traditional Avila.

2 Beach Cruisers available, first-come first-served.

If your desired dates are unavailable for this bungalow, we have other similar listings on the same property! Call Seven Sisters Vacation Rentals to find more properties for family and friends!

One (1) dog will be considered. The pet policy is 1 dog, under 45 pounds, non-shedding. The non-refundable pet fee is $50/night, max $225. A picture of your fury friend will be requested.

2 Beach Cruisers available for use upon request.

**If your desired dates are unavailable for this bungalow, we have another similar listing on the same property! Please search Avila Beach Bungalow 356 on Airbnb and explore!

result.name: The Coral House | Ocean Views
result.description:
Luxury Apartment in Avila Beach | Free Cancellation

Welcome to your beachside retreat in Avila Beach. This luxury one-bedroom apartment is just steps from the sand and offers refined comfort in a prime coastal setting. Thoughtfully designed with high-end finishes and a relaxed coastal feel, the apartment features a king-size bed, a queen sleeper sofa, a fully equipped kitchen, and a modern bathroom. Large windows fill the space with natural light and showcase ocean views, while the private balcony provides the perfect place to enjoy morning coffee or unwind in the evening.

Guests can take advantage of high-speed Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and two complimentary bikes for exploring Avila Beach and the surrounding coastline. Whether you’re planning a peaceful escape or an active seaside stay, this apartment serves as an ideal home base.

Guests enjoy full, private access to the entire apartment, designed for comfort, convenience, and effortless coastal living.

Living Area – Spacious and inviting with plush seating and a flat-screen TV.
Dining Area – Comfortable space for meals or light remote work.
Kitchen – Fully equipped with modern appliances, cookware, and utensils.
Bedroom – Private bedroom with a king-size bed, soft linens, and ample storage.
Bathroom – Clean, modern bathroom stocked with towels, toiletries, and a hairdryer.
Balcony – Private outdoor seating to enjoy ocean air, sunshine, and coastal views.

result.bookingcomPropertyDescription:
Vacation Home in Avila Beach - Free Cancellation!

Welcome to your beachside retreat! This charming one-bedroom home is steps from the sand and features coastal decor, a king-sized bed, and a queen-sized sleeper sofa, a full kitchen, and a modern bathroom. Large windows provide natural light and ocean views. Enjoy morning coffee on the private balcony or stroll to the beach. Amenities include Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and beach cruisers for exploring. Whether you seek relaxation or adventure, this home is the perfect base for a memorable seaside getaway.

Guests have full access to all spaces in this cozy, one-bedroom home, designed for your comfort and enjoyment:

Living Area: A spacious, comfortable lounge with plush seating and a flat-screen TV. Perfect for relaxing after a day of exploring.
Dining Area: A cozy dining space, ideal for enjoying meals or working on the go.
Kitchen: A fully equipped kitchen with modern appliances, cookware, and utensils. Feel free to prepare anything from a quick breakfast to a gourmet dinner.
Bedroom: A private bedroom with a comfortable king-size bed, soft linens, and ample closet space.
Bathroom: A clean, modern bathroom stocked with essentials, including towels, toiletries, and a hairdryer.
Balcony: A private outdoor area with seating, offering a peaceful spot to sip your morning coffee or enjoy an evening breeze.
